text:
@realDonaldTrump DT trying 2 take conversation away frm COVID-19? It will not work and you can't forget:
70k+ dead ppl
Dr said starting June 1st 3k ppl will die from COVID-19
Can't get tested 4 COVID-19
DT @SenateGOP @HouseGOP  practicing herd immunity bc it will hurt Dems not GOP base
